## Quick start guide

rSubmmiter is a package that allows simple communication between R and a SLURM cluster to achieve three different
tasks

1. Easy submission, monitoring and management of individual jobs.
2. Easy and fast submission of many jobs, using SLURM arrays.
3. Seamlessly parallelization of lapply.
